short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to flip webpages horizontally or vertically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickFlip is a simple Chrome extension that provides users with the ability to flip the view of their webpages either horizontally or vertically. With a single click from the extension's popup or the context menu, users can easily toggle between the standard view and the flipped view of the webpage. This can be particularly useful for designers, developers, or anyone needing to view a webpage from a different perspective. Whether you need to check the symmetry of your webpage design or just want to have some fun, QuickFlip can be your go-to tool.
